name: unregistered
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not on an official list or record: He was stopped by police and found in possession of an unregistered firearm. It's an area with a large number of unregistered voters.
More examplesFewer examplesThere are thousands of unregistered clinics carrying out cosmetic procedures with little oversight. Many people still labour in the informal sector of unregistered businesses, where wages are low. Probably tens of thousands remain unregistered, with little encouragement from unscrupulous employers to become legitimate workers with a national insurance number.

Add to word list
Add to word list
used to describe a person or organization that has not put information such as their name and address on an official list or record: State law allows police to take the vehicles of unlicensed and unregistered drivers.
